entry.tran: 令人烦恼的；难以负担的
entry.def: If you describe something as burdensome, you mean it is worrying or hard to deal with.

sentences.sentence: "the burdensome task of preparing the income tax return"
"my duties weren't onerous; I only had to greet the guests"
